casebody.data:
Paul Eugene NASEMAN, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
John W. RAVEN, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157354
COA: 339480 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 20, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motions of plaintiff-appellant to appoint counsel to assist him in the proceedings before this Court and to strike the answer filed by defendant-appellee are DENIED. On further order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing his reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 10, 2018.
